name: BubbleStones 2
overview: Bubblestones 2 is a Puzzle Bobble/Bust a move clone on the Amiga from Guy Massonanve This is my first ever play of the game. Taken from the readme. - AGA, 256 colors - possibility to change the look of the game. (Read the doc) - keyboard support - new game mode : HOT - many improvement for best gameplay - English docs
